name: METAL SOLDIER
description:
Robot warrior receive a mission to attack the base of a crazy general 

Facing the robots army of the crazy general with his famous army called Red Army

You'll be going in solo battling with the massive army


General big boss is a war maniac who raise the private army name Red Army

This army have been victorious with this many victories his became more obsess with wars which cause trouble everywhere

because of that the government send the robot warrior to defeat the general


How to play

A-D or W-S is the movement of the character (left right front back)

Press space to jump

Use mouse to look around in character perspective

Left click to shoot Right click to zoom

Press shift to run
